name: NBDY Scarlet
description:
Scarlet is the first in my NBDY series for anyone who wants a consistent character for their renders.

Scarlet is a Nobody, her unique look is a reflection of their individuality and originality, rather than an attempt to mimic someone else. The character's physical traits combined to create a look that is entirely their own, with no clear inspiration from any one person.

Scarlet has pale skin, freckles, thick eyebrows, and red hair but will gladly try out other colors and styles.

To use this embedding with the Automatic1111 web UI, save the downloaded file to /embeddings/nbdy-scarlet-sd15.pt, and then include the trigger word nbdy-scarlet-sd15 in your prompt.

Inspired by Zovya's Nobody series. Be sure to check out other contributions to the Nobody tag.

If you like my work, please consider buying me a coffee to show your appreciation.

modelVersions.name: SD 1.5
modelVersions.description:
Tested with many models including photorealistic and anime, should be compatible with almost any SD 1.5 based model.

May have a tendency to create NSFW images depending on the model used.
